level.heading: JUDICIAL REVIEW OF ADVISORY OPINIONS (ยง 3-305)

level.text: Any interested person adversely affected by the contents of an advisory opinion which has been issued in accordance with the provisions of this chapter may, pursuant to D.C. Code ยง 1-1103.05(c) (2006 Repl.), petition the Superior Court of the District of Columbia for review of the advisory opinion.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 28 D.C. Reg. 2153, 2155 (May 15, 1981); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 30 D.C. Reg. 5289, 5290 (October 14, 1983).
